name: Neon Swing (David Helbling)
description:
Neon Swing is an experimental 3D Platformer designed around the player's ability to grapple and swing their way through the levels. Swing, slingshot, and soar through seven levels without touching the ground.

=Keyboard Controls=

[WASD] Move

[MOUSE] Look

[LEFT CLICK] Left Grapple

[RIGHT CLICK] Right Grapple

[SPACEBAR] Jump / Disengage grapples

[ESCAPE]  Pause

=Gamepad Controls=

[LEFT STICK] Move

[RIGHT STICK] Look

[LEFT BUMPER (XBOX) / L1 (PS4)] Left Grapple

[RIGHT BUMPER (XBOX)/ R1 (PS4)] Right Grapple

[A (XBOX)/ X (PS4)]  Jump / Disengage grapples

[ESCAPE]  Pause
